issue.title: [CF 597] Stormstrike Range Check
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Make an icon with Stormstrike on it, with the Range Check setting selected.
2. Target something outside of melee range.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
Expected - Stormstrike icon disappears (because we are out of range)
Instead - Stormstrike icon stays active

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
6.0.2

Do you have an error log of what happened?
N/A

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
Clean icon string: ^1^T^SType^Scooldown ^SUnAlpha^N0 ^SName^SStormstrike ^SEnabled^B ^SRangeCheck^B ^t^N60206^S~`~| ^Sicon^^
Actual in-use string: ^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Scooldown ^SDurationAlpha^N0.1 ^SName^SStormstrike ^SDurationMaxEnabled^B ^SShowWhen^N3 ^SRangeCheck^B ^SEnabled^B ^SUnAlpha^N0.5 ^SDurationMax^N3 ^SShowTimerText^B ^t^N60206^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

Screenshot will be attached. As can be seen, the Stormstrike icon stays lit up, instead of fading like the Lava Lash and Earth Shocks icons (which are set up the same way).


> Posted by CurseForge user sirtyface | Imported from CurseForge issue #597 | Raw

Exactly the same issue with Frost Strike using r586

Should be fixed in r594 (Stormstrike, Frost Strike, and any other spell with this same problem, like Impending Victory)
